name: lilmolly
description: Molly is a utility for Svelte projects that identifies unused Svelte components and assists in safely cleaning them up, enhancing codebase clarity and developer experience. With the ability to undo actions and paired with delightful tidying haikus, Molly ensures that tidying up your Svelte project not only sparks joy but is also risk-free.
